title: Motherwell to host the Scottish Parliament for the day (Scottish Parliament)
text: ( Source : Scottish Parliament ) People in Motherwell will have the opportunity to have their voice heard as the Scottish Parliament comes to the town for the day on Monday 9 November . Holyrood 's Parliament Day initiative, introduced by the
